title: zpizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Italian, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Franchise pizzeria offering organic crust and sauce and has Daiya vegan cheese, vegetable toppings, vegan meat crumbles. Has gluten-free and whole wheat crusts. A berkeley vegan pizza (marinara sauce, cheese, veggie burger crumbles, zucchini, tomatoes, mushrooms, red onions, bell peppers).
